question: Who among the following is said to be the pioneer of guerilla warfare in the Deccan region?
explanation: Malik Ambar (1548 â€“ 13 May 1626) was a Siddi military leader in the Deccan region of India. He was the ruler of Ahmednagar. He humbled the might of the Mughals and Adil Shah of Bijapur and raised the low status of the Nizam Shah.
